pr_title: Avoiding ctl workload failure on some write failures

timeline.message: Avoiding ctl workload failure on some write failures

timeline.body:
please don't do concat in the logger
```suggestion
                    logger.error("Error during pre populating item", throwable);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
please don't do concat in the logger

Suggested change
logger.error("Error during pre populating item "+throwable.getMessage());
logger.error("Error during pre populating item", throwable);
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.body:
please fix the code style.
```suggestion
                successCount.get() - failureCount.get(), container.getId());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
please fix the code style.

Suggested change
successCount.get()-failureCount.get(), container.getId());
successCount.get() - failureCount.get(), container.getId());
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.body: We are not throwing error in case of pre-populating failures, is this intentional ?
timeline.bodyText: We are not throwing error in case of pre-populating failures, is this intentional ?
timeline.bodyHTML: We are not throwing error in case of pre-populating failures, is this intentional ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: Yes this is intentional , this was causing ctl failure if there was single failure on pre populated document create.
replies.author: simplynaveen20

timeline.body: logging this as warning instead? Doesn't do any harm, correct?
timeline.bodyText: logging this as warning instead? Doesn't do any harm, correct?
timeline.bodyHTML: logging this as warning instead? Doesn't do any harm, correct?
timeline.author: FabianMeiswinkel

replies.bodyText: Thanks , that make sense , i will keep it in note and add in it next time when i touch ctl, need this to get merge now
replies.author: simplynaveen20
